duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and coordinate assortment placement in stores based on buying/merchandising experience.
Collaborate with the Buyer on product selection and store strategy.
Facilitate the planning and timing of order delivery and quantities of product by store grade.
Create and execute Buy Plan, ad strategy, and distributions for product strategy.
Coordinate returns and recalls of product, and manage size integrity at the chain level.
Communicate with cross-functional teams and vendors for effective coordination.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in relevant field and 2+ years’ experience in Corporate Merchandising/Planning or Buying, or equivalent experience in retail planning, required.
Comprehensive knowledge of retail systems, terms, and calculations.
Strong computer skills including Microsoft Office with advanced Excel experience required.
Strong understanding and familiarity with query and reporting tools, and a basic understanding of other financial and assortment planning tools.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to articulate ideas.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team with excellent time management and organization skills.
Good analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to evaluate problems and apply knowledge to identify appropriate solutions.
Highly flexible and adapts well to a rapidly changing environment.
